summary: Makes all Pelts, Hides and Leather much more valuable to make the role of a Hunter in Skyrim feasible. Includes Dawnguard and Dragonborn Pelts, Hides and Leather too.
descriptionHtml:
Increases the value of Pelts, Hides, Leather and Leather Strips significantly, making a \"Hunter\" type character feasible. Simple as can be. Prices below.

Requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn!

If using SkyRe, please load after SkyRe - Main.

V2 Changelog:
- Tweaked the weight of Pelts, Bones, Dragonscales and Chitins which are used to craft Armour. 
- Increased the value of Vale Pelts slightly.
- Increased the value of Dragonbones, Dragonscales, Mammoth Tusks, Horker Tusks, Chaurus Chitin and Shellbug Chitin.
- Decreased the value of Leather Strips to 8. This means that Leather is marginally more valuable than Leather Strips as Leather is worth 35, which makes sense as Leather is more versatile.

Values within V1 -

Vanilla Wolf Pelt: 10
New Wolf Pelt: 50 (x5)

Vanilla Ice Wolf Pelt: 15
New Wolf Pelt: 75 (x5)

Vanilla Werewolf Pelt: 20
New Werewolf Pelt: 460 (x23)

Vanilla Sabre Cat Pelt: 25
New Sabre Cat Pelt: 125 (x5)

Vanilla Snow Sabre Cat Pelt: 40
New Snow Sabre Cat Pelt: 200 (x5)

Vanilla Fox Pelt: 5
New Fox Pelt: 60 (x12)

Vanilla Snow Fox Pelt: 7
New Snow Fox Pelt: 85 (x12)

New Deer Pelt: 50 (x5)

author: Kozoi
